member.name: T:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute
member.summary: This class defines an attribute that can be applied to an action or a controller to enable CORS. By default, it allows all origins, methods and headers.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Comma-separated list of origins that are allowed to access the resource. Use "*" to allow all.
Comma-separated list of headers that are supported by the resource. Use "*" to allow all. Use null or empty string to allow none.
Comma-separated list of methods that are supported by the resource. Use "*" to allow all. Use null or empty string to allow none.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Comma-separated list of origins that are allowed to access the resource. Use "*" to allow all.
Comma-separated list of headers that are supported by the resource. Use "*" to allow all. Use null or empty string to allow none.
Comma-separated list of methods that are supported by the resource. Use "*" to allow all. Use null or empty string to allow none.
Comma-separated list of headers that the resource might use and can be exposed. Use null or empty string to expose none.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.ExposedHeaders
member.summary: Gets the headers that the resource might use and can be exposed.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.Headers
member.summary: Gets the headers that are supported by the resource.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.Methods
member.summary: Gets the methods that are supported by the resource.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.Origins
member.summary: Gets the origins that are allowed to access the resource.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.PreflightMaxAge
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds the results of a preflight request can be cached.

member.name: P:System.Web.Http.Cors.EnableCorsAttribute.SupportsCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the resource supports user credentials in the request.
